title: Sugar Daddy
description: The sugarThey say love doesn’t cost a thing. It does if you’re McKenzie, a broke college graduate looking for a little security. She’s ready to be bought and paid for. And it doesn’t hurt that she has no limits because that’s what these sugar daddy types want. Thanks to some plotting with her best friend, she finds her money bag in the form of golf sensation Gage Remington. She’ll give up her goods, but she won’t come cheap.The daddyWhen it comes to McKenzie St. James, Gage likes for her to make him come then go. With his millions, he doesn’t mind paying her for it. But it’s all starting to feel a little too real. Now he wants her to keep coming back. It’s a slippery slope that somehow leads him to the altar. He wasn’t looking for anything more than an arrangement, but as the saying goes, you get what you pay for. Or is he getting more than what he bargained for?This enemies-to-lovers romance has a real-life tragic event that some may find extremely hard to read.
author: Rebel Wild
